name: Operation Starbit
description:
Operation Starbit is a puzzle game where you have to blast the incoming aliens by matching the corresponding color cannons to the aliens skin, and you can only move around your cannons by making them trade places with the cannon next to them. It gets intense, so be prepared! 

Gamepad support included! 

Press M key on start screen to view manual

Downloadable version link

https://secretsnowconepeople.itch.io/operation-starbit-downloadable
